name: Beat Gun
description:
INTRODUCTION

Beat Gun is a solo developed game made for the JUICE JAM in only 4 days.
at first, I thought of a hack and slash roguelike, but it ended up as a rhythm wave shooter.

Anyways, I hope you like the game and don't forget to NOT STOP THE MUSIC.

It was first going to become a hack and slash rogue like action rpg with a twist but in the end i chose to make it a rhythm wave shooter game.

CONTROLS 

WASD - For movement

LEFT CLICK - To shoot

You have to match your shot with the bpm of the song and survive the monster waves until the song ends.
